text: Benjamín Prado Casas (4 January 1926 – 7 March 2022) was a Chilean politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Party. He was in the Senate of Chile from 1965 to 1973. Prado Casas was born in Valparaíso, Chile. From 1970 until 1971, he was the President of the Christian Democratic Party. Prado Casas died in Concón, Chile on 7 March 2022, at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chilean politicians Category:People from Valparaíso
title: Benjamín Prado Casas
